title: Reminder that Riot KateyKhaos will be a bit busy this week with her wedding.

replies.body:
Ahhh hi! You're too kind. ;_; Thank you! 

I have been working on some finishing touches on the wedding (...I still need to do escort cards and finish vows...). I've been trying to keep up with everyone on the boards and keeping everyone up to date on content! :D SO FAR SO GOOD AND NOTHING IS GOING HORRIBLY WRONG! Probably {{champion:222}} 'd that. 

Might be good to point out that I'm getting married next Saturday, and then headed on my honeymoon after, so I'll be AFK from the 23rd - October 3rd. Don't worry, though, you'll be in good hands with my fellow QA lady, Riot Time Wizard! ^-^ 

<3

... i don' t know how you do whishes for this thing in america so i will just spam some Nami

{{champion:267}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:267}}
I don't think there's a better way to do it in this case. <3
Maybe we should spam {{champion:17}} in the game instead... you know, keep Satan busy with League. :P
Nah, Satan is invited to the party too - he sits in the table of the least welcome guests, if i understood well xD
It makes me so happy that people keep track of this, hahaha.

Congratulations!

I hope you have a great time and good luck on the honeymoon!
